australia: Julia Gillard challenged and replaced Kevin Rudd as leader of the Labor Party to become the 27th and first female Prime Minister of Australia.
Mary MacKillop canonised as Australia's first Saint of the Roman Catholic Church.<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference">[5]</sup>

Australian federal election, 2010: Election results in hung Parliament and narrow victory by Julia Gillard (ALP) over Tony Abbott (Lib-Nat Coalition); Liberal Ken Wyatt becomes the first Aboriginal elected to the Australian House of Representatives
